name: Andrew Weiman
motivations: Motivated to solve big problems, take specific action, and create something unique. Wants to be involved end-to-end while also seeing quick results and producing something extraordinary; benefits from resolving those tensions and thinking like a strategic/urban planner to integrate all aspects and follow-through.
abilities: Primary competencies: detailed analysis, strategic thinking, and creative thinking. Drawn to teams that focus on Intelligence, Strategy, and Development; prides self on solving complex problems, planning smartly, and creating new products/services.
personality: Authentic tactician focused on executing details and plans correctly; perfectionist, integrative, action-oriented. Can feel tension between analyzing and deciding, but productivity bias resolves it. May appear demanding/tough; benefits from spontaneity and flexibility to be more approachable.
coreTheme: Focusing on both creative and tangible solutions: bring together large-scale and creative plans and personally ensure effective implementation.

keyTraits.description: Practical-minded; wants tangible accomplishment; hands-on and effective.
Curious; likes solving complex questions; digs into facts and reasons.
Sees all sides; integrates findings; enjoys managing others to get things done.

cautionAreas.description: Prefers quick outcomes; may show frustration when progress is slow.
Holds onto details; may delay decisions by seeking more data.

cautionAreas.area: Tends to think you are right
cautionAreas.description: Confidence in reasoned conclusions can limit openness to other views.

styleChallenges: Remember back to when you were new
Explain where your knowledge came from
Have patience explaining the big picture
Take some time to build a friendship
Better understand your team leaderâ€™s background
Approach your team leader's suggestions with an open ear
